pages.text:
events at FARM & FIRE
Thank you for considering Farm & Fire for your special occasion. We look forward to exceeding your expectations and creating a memorable experience for you and your guests. If you have any further questions or would like to discuss your event in more detail, please do not hesitate to contact us.
Event Hours
Our operating hours are from 11:00 a.m. to 9:30 p.m. To comply with our neighborhood noise ordinance, we kindly request that all events conclude by 9:30 p.m. and that guests vacate the premises by 10:00 p.m.
The BOAT BAR
Our Boat Bar can accommodate up to 75 guests (including bar seating) and offers pre-set menus to suit your needs. Thereâs no charge for using the Boat Bar, but we do have food and drink minimums that change with the seasons and menu choices. If your total bill is less than the minimum, weâll charge the difference as the venue fee.
The west bar and outdoor Patio
For larger gatherings of up to 95 guests (including bar seating). The space fee and menu options vary depending on the season. Tent rental information is available upon request to provide coverage in case of inclement weather.
The outdoor patio
For outdoor gatherings of up to 50 guests. The space fee and menu options vary depending on the season. Tent rental information is available upon request to provide coverage in case of inclement weather.
the restaurant
The entire restaurant can be reserved for up to 180 guests, subject to availability, for your event, with details such as pricing available upon request.
Provisions
We provide standard table settings for all events, including white linens and cloth napkins. Our preferred vendors can arrange customizations and additional event options.
Staffing
Staffing policy: The number of servers or bartenders will be determined based on the size and complexity of the event to ensure excellent service. Additional fees may apply for setup and breakdown. A 23% gratuity for all events will also be added to your final invoice.
Beverage Options
Choose from our extensive wine list and full-service bar. All charged on consumption.
